turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are you there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'm here, sorry. I would like to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, let me get that started for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like four medium pizzas, two of the pepperoni, one meat lovers, and one supreme pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what type of crust did you want on those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thin crust for all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said 4 medium pizzas, 2 pepperoni, 1 meat lovers, and 1 supreme, all with thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did i get your order correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct, yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $56 is your total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the order has been placed. it'll be ready for pick up in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else today sir?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be it for me. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, enjoy those pizzas.
